trans-unit.source: Cancel an Async Task or a List of Tasks (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 取消一項非同步工作或一份工作 (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: Cancel an Async Task or a List of Tasks (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 取消一項非同步工作或一份工作 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: You can set up a button that you can use to cancel an async application if you don't want to wait for it to finish.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定按鈕可讓您取消非同步應用程式，如果您不想等候它完成。

trans-unit.source: By following the examples in this topic, you can add a cancellation button to an application that downloads the contents of one website or a list of websites.
trans-unit.target: 依照本主題中的範例，您可以取消按鈕加入的應用程式，下載網站的內容或網站的清單。

trans-unit.source: The examples use the UI that [Fine-Tuning Your Async Application (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/fine-tuning-your-async-application.md) describes.
trans-unit.target: 範例會使用 UI，[微調非同步應用程式 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/fine-tuning-your-async-application.md)描述。

trans-unit.source: To run the examples, you must have Visual Studio 2012 or newer and the .NET Framework 4.5 or newer installed on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例，您必須擁有 Visual Studio 2012 或較新和.NET Framework 4.5 或更新版本安裝在電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Cancel a Task
trans-unit.target: 取消工作

trans-unit.source: The first example associates the **Cancel** button with a single download task.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例將**取消**具有單一的下載工作的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: If you choose the button while the application is downloading content, the download is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式會下載內容時，您可以選擇該按鈕，則會取消下載。

trans-unit.source: Downloading the Example
trans-unit.target: 下載範例

trans-unit.source: You can download the complete Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) project from [Async Sample: Fine Tuning Your Application](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255046) and then follow these steps.
trans-unit.target: 您可以下載完整的 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 專案，從[非同步範例︰ 順利微調您的應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255046)，然後依照下列步驟。

trans-unit.source: Decompress the file that you downloaded, and then start Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 解壓縮您下載的檔案，然後啟動 Visual Studio。

trans-unit.source: On the menu bar, choose **File**, **Open**, **Project/Solution**.
trans-unit.target: 在功能表列上，依序選擇 [檔案] 、[開啟舊檔] 及 [專案/方案] 。

trans-unit.source: In the **Open Project** dialog box, open the folder that holds the sample code that you decompressed, and then open the solution (.sln) file for AsyncFineTuningVB.
trans-unit.target: 在**開啟專案**對話方塊中，開啟保存在解壓縮時，範例程式碼的資料夾，並接著開啟 AsyncFineTuningVB 方案 (.sln) 檔案。

trans-unit.source: In **Solution Explorer**, open the shortcut menu for the **CancelATask** project, and then choose **Set as StartUp Project**.
trans-unit.target: 在**方案總管 中**，開啟捷徑功能表**CancelATask**專案，然後再選擇**設定為啟始專案**。

trans-unit.source: Choose the F5 key to run the project.
trans-unit.target: 選擇 F5 鍵以執行專案。

trans-unit.source: Choose the Ctrl+F5 keys to run the project without debugging it.
trans-unit.target: 選擇 Ctrl + F5 鍵以執行專案，但不偵錯它。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want to download the project, you can review the MainWindow.xaml.vb files at the end of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要下載的專案，您可以檢閱本主題結尾處的 MainWindow.xaml.vb 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Building the Example
trans-unit.target: 建置範例

trans-unit.source: The following changes add a **Cancel** button to an application that downloads a website.
trans-unit.target: 加入下列變更**取消** 按鈕，下載網站的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want to download or build the example, you can review the final product in the "Complete Examples" section at the end of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要下載或建置範例，您可以檢閱本主題結尾處的 「 完整的範例 」 一節中最終產品。

trans-unit.source: Asterisks mark the changes in the code.
trans-unit.target: 星號標示的程式碼變更。

trans-unit.source: To build the example yourself, step by step, follow the instructions in the "Downloading the Example" section, but choose **StarterCode** as the **StartUp Project** instead of **CancelATask**.
trans-unit.target: 若要建置範例自行逐步解說，依照指示下載 「 範例 」 一節中的，但是選擇**StarterCode**為**啟始專案**而不是**CancelATask**。

trans-unit.source: Then add the following changes to the MainWindow.xaml.vb file of that project.
trans-unit.target: 該專案的 MainWindow.xaml.vb 檔案，然後加入下列變更。

trans-unit.source: Declare a `CancellationTokenSource` variable, `cts`, that’s in scope for all methods that access it.
trans-unit.target: 宣告`CancellationTokenSource`變數`cts`，這是所有的方法來存取該範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Add the following event handler for the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 新增下列事件處理常式**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to notify `cts` when the user requests cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會使用<xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來通知`cts`當使用者要求取消。</xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Make the following changes in the event handler for the **Start** button, `startButton_Click`.
trans-unit.target: 進行下列變更在事件處理常式**啟動** 按鈕， `startButton_Click`。

trans-unit.source: Instantiate the `CancellationTokenSource`, `cts`.
trans-unit.target: 具現化`CancellationTokenSource`， `cts`。

trans-unit.source: In the call to `AccessTheWebAsync`, which downloads the contents of a specified website, send the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of `cts` as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`AccessTheWebAsync`、 下載指定的網站內容、 傳送<xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`cts`做為引數。</xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Token%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `Token` property propagates the message if cancellation is requested.
trans-unit.target: `Token`屬性會傳播訊息，如果已要求取消。

trans-unit.source: Add a catch block that displays a message if the user chooses to cancel the download operation.
trans-unit.target: 新增會顯示訊息，如果使用者選擇取消下載作業的 catch 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows the changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼顯示的變更。

trans-unit.source: In `AccessTheWebAsync`, use the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.GetAsync%28System.String%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload of the `GetAsync` method in the <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> type to download the contents of a website.
trans-unit.target: 在`AccessTheWebAsync`，使用<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.GetAsync%28System.String%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>多載`GetAsync`方法中的<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient>下載網站的內容類型。</xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient> </xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClient.GetAsync%28System.String%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Pass `ct`, the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken> parameter of `AccessTheWebAsync`, as the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`ct`、<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>參數`AccessTheWebAsync`，做為第二個引數。</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>

trans-unit.source: The token carries the message if the user chooses the **Cancel** button.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選擇權杖夾帶了訊息**取消** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows the changes in `AccessTheWebAsync`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範在變更`AccessTheWebAsync`。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t cancel the program, it produces the following output.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有取消程式，便會產生下列輸出。

trans-unit.source: If you choose the **Cancel** button before the program finishes downloading the content, the program produces the following output.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇**取消**按鈕，然後再程式完成之後下載內容，此程式會產生下列輸出。

trans-unit.source: Cancel a List of Tasks
trans-unit.target: 取消工作的清單

trans-unit.source: You can extend the previous example to cancel many tasks by associating the same `CancellationTokenSource` instance with each task.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擴充先前的範例，若要取消產生關聯，以相同的許多工作`CancellationTokenSource`與每個工作的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you choose the **Cancel** button, you cancel all tasks that aren’t yet complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇**取消** 按鈕，取消尚無完整的所有工作。

trans-unit.source: Downloading the Example
trans-unit.target: 下載範例

trans-unit.source: You can download the complete Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) project from [Async Sample: Fine Tuning Your Application](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255046) and then follow these steps.
trans-unit.target: 您可以下載完整的 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 專案，從[非同步範例︰ 順利微調您的應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255046)，然後依照下列步驟。

trans-unit.source: Decompress the file that you downloaded, and then start Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 解壓縮您下載的檔案，然後啟動 Visual Studio。

trans-unit.source: On the menu bar, choose **File**, **Open**, **Project/Solution**.
trans-unit.target: 在功能表列上，依序選擇 [檔案] 、[開啟舊檔] 及 [專案/方案] 。

trans-unit.source: In the **Open Project** dialog box, open the folder that holds the sample code that you decompressed, and then open the solution (.sln) file for AsyncFineTuningVB.
trans-unit.target: 在**開啟專案**對話方塊中，開啟保存在解壓縮時，範例程式碼的資料夾，並接著開啟 AsyncFineTuningVB 方案 (.sln) 檔案。

trans-unit.source: In **Solution Explorer**, open the shortcut menu for the **CancelAListOfTasks** project, and then choose **Set as StartUp Project**.
trans-unit.target: 在**方案總管 中**，開啟捷徑功能表**CancelAListOfTasks**專案，然後再選擇**設定為啟始專案**。

trans-unit.source: Choose the F5 key to run the project.
trans-unit.target: 選擇 F5 鍵以執行專案。

trans-unit.source: Choose the Ctrl+F5 keys to run the project without debugging it.
trans-unit.target: 選擇 Ctrl + F5 鍵以執行專案，但不偵錯它。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want to download the project, you can review the MainWindow.xaml.vb files at the end of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要下載的專案，您可以檢閱本主題結尾處的 MainWindow.xaml.vb 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Building the Example
trans-unit.target: 建置範例

trans-unit.source: To extend the example yourself, step by step, follow the instructions in the "Downloading the Example" section, but choose **CancelATask** as the **StartUp Project**.
trans-unit.target: 若要擴充範例自行逐步解說，依照指示下載 「 範例 」 一節中的，但是選擇**CancelATask**為**啟始專案**。

trans-unit.source: Add the following changes to that project.
trans-unit.target: 專案中加入下列變更。

trans-unit.source: Asterisks mark the changes in the program.
trans-unit.target: 星號標示的程式中的變更。

trans-unit.source: Add a method to create a list of web addresses.
trans-unit.target: 加入方法以建立一份 web 位址。

trans-unit.source: Call the method in `AccessTheWebAsync`.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫方法`AccessTheWebAsync`。

trans-unit.source: Add the following loop in `AccessTheWebAsync` to process each web address in the list.
trans-unit.target: 將下列的迴圈中加入`AccessTheWebAsync`處理每個清單中的網址。

trans-unit.source: Because `AccessTheWebAsync` displays the lengths, the method doesn't need to return anything.
trans-unit.target: 因為`AccessTheWebAsync`顯示長度，此方法不需傳回任何項目。

trans-unit.source: Remove the return statement, and change the return type of the method to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> instead of <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.
trans-unit.target: 移除 return 陳述式，並將方法的傳回型別變更為 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>而不是<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: <CodeContentPlaceHolder>10</CodeContentPlaceHolder>
trans-unit.target: <CodeContentPlaceHolder>10</CodeContentPlaceHolder>

trans-unit.source: Call the method from `startButton_Click` by using a statement instead of an expression.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法從`startButton_Click`使用陳述式，而不是運算式。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t cancel the program, it produces the following output.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有取消程式，便會產生下列輸出。

trans-unit.source: If you choose the **Cancel** button before the downloads are complete, the output contains the lengths of the downloads that completed before the cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇**取消**之前會完整下載 按鈕，輸出會包含完成之前取消下載的長度。

trans-unit.source: Complete Examples
trans-unit.target: 完整範例

trans-unit.source: The following sections contain the code for each of the previous examples.
trans-unit.target: 下列各節包含的程式碼，為每個先前的範例。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you must add a reference for <xref:System.Net.Http>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須加入<xref:System.Net.Http>.</xref:System.Net.Http>的參考

trans-unit.source: You can download the projects from [Async Sample: Fine Tuning Your Application](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255046).
trans-unit.target: 您可以下載的專案[非同步範例︰ 順利微調您的應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255046)。

trans-unit.source: Cancel a Task Example
trans-unit.target: 取消工作範例

trans-unit.source: The following code is the complete MainWindow.xaml.vb file for the example that cancels a single task.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼是完整的 MainWindow.xaml.vb 檔案，例如取消單一工作。

trans-unit.source: Cancel a List of Tasks Example
trans-unit.target: 取消工作範例的清單

trans-unit.source: The following code is the complete MainWindow.xaml.vb file for the example that cancels a list of tasks.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼是完整的 MainWindow.xaml.vb 檔案，例如取消的工作清單。
